languages.text: "Единицу не покидает ощущение, что принципы работы Администратума есть пародийное восприятие священного догмата "уподобься в служении механизму". Предтечи имели в виду не это!"

"This unit cannot help feeling that the functional principles of the Administratum are a parodic interpretation of that sacred dogma of service: 'mimic the mechanism.' This is not what our forerunners envisaged!"
languages.original_text: "Единицу не покидает ощущение, что принципы работы Администратума есть пародийное восприятие священного догмата "уподобься в служении механизму". Предтечи имели в виду не это!"

traits.locale_text: "This unit cannot help feeling that the functional principles of the Administratum are a parodic interpretation of that sacred dogma of service: 'mimic the mechanism.' This is not what our forerunners envisaged!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This unit cannot help feeling that the functional principles of the Administratum are a parodic interpretation of that sacred dogma of service: 'mimic the mechanism.' This is not what our forerunners envisaged!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This unit cannot help feeling that the functional principles of the Administratum are a parodic interpretation of that sacred dogma of service: 'mimic the mechanism.' This is not what our forerunners envisaged!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “本单位不禁认为，内政部的职能原则，其实是对‘行如机械’这一神圣服务信条的拙劣诠释。这根本不是我们的先驱所设想的那样！”
languages.original_text: "This unit cannot help feeling that the functional principles of the Administratum are a parodic interpretation of that sacred dogma of service: 'mimic the mechanism.' This is not what our forerunners envisaged!"

traits.locale_text: “本单位不禁认为，内政部的职能原则，其实是对‘行如机械’这一神圣服务信条的拙劣诠释。这根本不是我们的先驱所设想的那样！”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette unité a l'impression que les principes de fonctionnement de l'Administratum ne sont finalement qu'une interprétation parodique de la devise du service : "imiter le mécanisme". Ce n'est certainement pas ce que nos prédécesseurs avaient en tête ! »
languages.original_text: "This unit cannot help feeling that the functional principles of the Administratum are a parodic interpretation of that sacred dogma of service: 'mimic the mechanism.' This is not what our forerunners envisaged!"

traits.locale_text: « Cette unité a l'impression que les principes de fonctionnement de l'Administratum ne sont finalement qu'une interprétation parodique de la devise du service : "imiter le mécanisme". Ce n'est certainement pas ce que nos prédécesseurs avaient en tête ! »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta unidad no puede evitar sentir que los principios funcionales del Administratum son una interpretación paródica del sagrado dogma del servicio: "imita al mecanismo". ¡Esto no es lo que nuestros predecesores querían!».
languages.original_text: "This unit cannot help feeling that the functional principles of the Administratum are a parodic interpretation of that sacred dogma of service: 'mimic the mechanism.' This is not what our forerunners envisaged!"

traits.locale_text: «Esta unidad no puede evitar sentir que los principios funcionales del Administratum son una interpretación paródica del sagrado dogma del servicio: "imita al mecanismo". ¡Esto no es lo que nuestros predecesores querían!».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「当ユニットからすれば、行政局の機能原則は神聖な奉仕の教義をまねて解釈したにすぎない。すなわち”メカニズムの模倣”である。これは私たちの先人が想定したものではない！」
languages.original_text: "This unit cannot help feeling that the functional principles of the Administratum are a parodic interpretation of that sacred dogma of service: 'mimic the mechanism.' This is not what our forerunners envisaged!"

traits.locale_text: 「当ユニットからすれば、行政局の機能原則は神聖な奉仕の教義をまねて解釈したにすぎない。すなわち”メカニズムの模倣”である。これは私たちの先人が想定したものではない！」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Einheit kann nicht umhin zu bemerken, dass die Funktionsweise des Administratums eine parodistische Interpretation des heiligen Dogmas des Dienstes darstellen: 'Imitiere den Mechanismus.' So hatten unsere Wegbereiter das nicht geplant!"
languages.original_text: "This unit cannot help feeling that the functional principles of the Administratum are a parodic interpretation of that sacred dogma of service: 'mimic the mechanism.' This is not what our forerunners envisaged!"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Einheit kann nicht umhin zu bemerken, dass die Funktionsweise des Administratums eine parodistische Interpretation des heiligen Dogmas des Dienstes darstellen: 'Imitiere den Mechanismus.' So hatten unsere Wegbereiter das nicht geplant!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This unit cannot help feeling that the functional principles of the Administratum are a parodic interpretation of that sacred dogma of service: 'mimic the mechanism.' This is not what our forerunners envisaged!"

languages.text: "Bu birim, Administratum'un çalışma prensiplerinin nihayetinde kutsal hizmetin dogması olan 'mekanizmanın taklidi'nin gülünç bir yorumundan ibaret olduğunu düşünüyor. Seleflerimiz öngördüğü, kesinlikle bu değildi!"
languages.original_text: "This unit cannot help feeling that the functional principles of the Administratum are a parodic interpretation of that sacred dogma of service: 'mimic the mechanism.' This is not what our forerunners envisaged!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu birim, Administratum'un çalışma prensiplerinin nihayetinde kutsal hizmetin dogması olan 'mekanizmanın taklidi'nin gülünç bir yorumundan ibaret olduğunu düşünüyor. Seleflerimiz öngördüğü, kesinlikle bu değildi!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
